PokerPlayerMod:DefaultCommonAttack.NAME: Strike
PokerPlayerMod:DefaultCommonAttack.DESCRIPTION: This will become an Awesome Attack card.

PokerPlayerMod:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Placeholder
PokerPlayerMod:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: This will become an Awesome Attack card.

PokerPlayerMod:DefaultUncommonAttack.NAME: Placeholder
PokerPlayerMod:DefaultUncommonAttack.DESCRIPTION: This will become an Awesome Attack card.

PokerPlayerMod:DefaultUncommonPower.NAME: Placeholder
PokerPlayerMod:DefaultUncommonPower.DESCRIPTION: This will become an Awesome Power card.
PokerPlayerMod:DefaultUncommonPower.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This will become an Awesome Power card.

PokerPlayerMod:PowerPower.NAME: Power Power
PokerPlayerMod:PowerPower.DESCRIPTION: This will become an Awesome Power Power.

PokerPlayerMod:DefaultRareAttack.NAME: Placeholder
PokerPlayerMod:DefaultRareAttack.DESCRIPTION: This will become an Awesome Rare Attack card.

PokerPlayerMod:DefaultRarePower.NAME: Placeholder Form
PokerPlayerMod:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: This will become an Awesome Form card.

PokerPlayerMod:DiamondStrike.NAME: Diamond Strike
PokerPlayerMod:DiamondStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Add a random ppk:Diamonds Card to your hand.

PokerPlayerMod:BadJoker.NAME: Bad Joker
PokerPlayerMod:BadJoker.DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of 3 random Poker Cards to add to your hand. NL Exhaust.
PokerPlayerMod:BadJoker.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of 3 random Poker Cards to add to your hand.

PokerPlayerMod:Configure.NAME: Configure
PokerPlayerMod:Configure.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. Put a card from your hand onto the top of your draw pile.

PokerPlayerMod:Mulligan.NAME: Mulligan
PokerPlayerMod:Mulligan.DESCRIPTION: Discard any number of cards. Draw cards until you have 5 cards in hand.

PokerPlayerMod:WildCard.NAME: Wild Card
PokerPlayerMod:WildCard.DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 from ALL Poker Cards to add into your hand. NL Exhaust.
